title: Nord Ice
author: nordtheme
description: An arctic, north-bluish SketchyBar configuration based on the Nord color palette. Clean and elegant with a focus on readability and minimalism. Works beautifully in both light and dark environments.

dotfiles.sketchybarrc:
#!/bin/bash

source "$CONFIG_DIR/colors.sh"

# Bar appearance
sketchybar --bar height=28 \
                 color=$NORD0 \
                 border_width=0 \
                 shadow=off \
                 position=top \
                 sticky=on \
                 padding_right=10 \
                 padding_left=10 \
                 topmost=off

# Default styling
sketchybar --default icon.font="SF Pro:Medium:14.0" \
                     icon.color=$NORD4 \
                     label.font="SF Pro:Medium:14.0" \
                     label.color=$NORD4 \
                     background.color=$NORD1 \
                     background.corner_radius=4 \
                     background.height=22

# Items
source "$CONFIG_DIR/items/spaces.sh"
source "$CONFIG_DIR/items/clock.sh"
source "$CONFIG_DIR/items/battery.sh"

sketchybar --update
